ygData.msgSnippet: much heavier ... From: Dean Boyle  yeah but whats the weight? Is it lighter then BANDED OR CHAINMAIL ?????????? ... From: Mifsud,
ygData.messageBody:
much heavier

>>> "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...> 5.26.99 9:20:28 PM >>>
From: "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...>

yeah but whats the weight? Is it lighter then BANDED OR CHAINMAIL ??????????

----Original Message Follows----
From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
To: "'warriors_eq@onelist.com'" <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Subject: [warriors_eq] black
Date: Wed, 26 May 1999 13:34:57 +0900

From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>

Blackened armour is equal in AC to chain, which is inferior to banded
(unless the patch just changed things).
